entries.name: Movement of the Sun: Activity 1
entries.description: Students will create program that will read the value of a photoresistor on specific user input.
entries.author: Content Creator

entries.name: Movement of the Sun: Activity 2
entries.description: Students will utilize a while loop in their program.
entries.author: Content Creator

entries.name: Movement of the Sun: Activity 3
entries.description: Students will learn how to nest loops.
entries.author: Content Creator
